title: Symbolism in Folk Stories | The Cosmic Significance of Puss in Boots.
description:
I go through the surprisingly universal structure of Puss in Boots and how it's symbolism is an image of how a the last thing can become the first after crossing the waters of chaos.  

For more on St-Christopher
https://www.orthodoxartsjournal.org/the-icon-of-st-christopher/
https://youtu.be/zXOdlIXDsr8

Frog Prince
https://youtu.be/Ixc9i1G7eew

Talk in Vancouver
https://youtu.be/OdZB1nKmOxc

Support this channel:
patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: https://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.pageaucarvings.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jonathanpageau
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan
